~~~
library(gapminder)
~~~
{: .language-r}


~~~
data <- gapminder %>% 
  filter(continent == "Europe") %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  mutate(rank = rank(gdpPercap)) %>% 
  ungroup()
~~~
{: .language-r}



~~~
Error in gapminder %>% filter(continent == "Europe") %>% group_by(year) %>% : could not find function "%>%"
~~~
{: .error}



~~~
data %>% 
  ggplot()
~~~
{: .language-r}



~~~
Error in data %>% ggplot(): could not find function "%>%"
~~~
{: .error}



~~~
static_plot <- data %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=rank, y=gdpPercap)) +
  geom_col() +
  facet_wrap(~year) +
  aes(fill = country) +
  geom_text(col = "gray13",
            hjust = "right",
            aes(label = country),
            y = -5) +
  theme(legend.position = "none") +
  coord_flip() +
  scale_y_reverse() +  
  labs(fill = NULL)
~~~
{: .language-r}



~~~
Error in data %>% ggplot(aes(x = rank, y = gdpPercap)): could not find function "%>%"
~~~
{: .error}



~~~
static_plot +
  facet_null() +
  aes(group = country) +
  transition_time(year)
~~~
{: .language-r}
